abstract: Mr. Sekulow, who will co-lead the president’s impeachment defense team, has stayed on as Mr. Trump’s personal lawyer while others have left their posts.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Jay Sekulow, who will lead President Trump’s impeachment defense team with Pat A. Cipollone, is one of Mr. Trump’s longest-serving personal lawyers, an achievement in itself as the legal team’s revolving door spins wildly.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
AMERICAN CENTER FOR LAW AND JUSTICE
